author: giffels
body:
Hi @amaltaro , @geneguvo,

the new hot fix version DBS 3.2.1c fixes the show stopper of todays production upgrade. 

Could you deploy it to testbed and once it has been validated to production, please?

Thank you very much,
Yuyi & Manuel

CC: to @belforte
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-client dbs3-migration dbs3-pycurl-client
